Class netscape.application.IFCListViewAccess 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----netscape.application.IFCListViewAccess
public class IFCListViewAccess
extends Object
This class has been created to make it possible effectively subclass from ListView class. Unfortunately there are 5 package instance variables in ListView that don't have getter or setter methods.

IFCListViewAccess()

anchorItem(ListView)
dirtyItems(ListView)
items(ListView)
origSelectedItem(ListView)
setAnchorItem(ListView, ListItem)
setDirtyItems(ListView, Vector)
setOrigSelectedItem(ListView, ListItem)
setTracking(ListView, boolean)
tracking(ListView)

IFCListViewAccess 
  public IFCListViewAccess()

anchorItem 
  public final static ListItem anchorItem(ListView lv)
setAnchorItem 
  public final static void setAnchorItem(ListView lv,
                                         ListItem newItem)
tracking 
  public final static boolean tracking(ListView lv)
setTracking 
  public final static void setTracking(ListView lv,
                                       boolean newTracking)
items 
  public final static Vector items(ListView lv)
origSelectedItem 
  public final static ListItem origSelectedItem(ListView lv)
setOrigSelectedItem 
  public final static void setOrigSelectedItem(ListView lv,
                                               ListItem item)
dirtyItems 
  public final static Vector dirtyItems(ListView lv)
setDirtyItems 
  public final static void setDirtyItems(ListView lv,
                                         Vector items)
